Tool

NameGrid Cell Index
ID21
AuthorVictor Olaya (c) 2004
Specificationgrid

Description

Creates an index grid according to the cell values either in ascending or descending order.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grid Grid (input)GRID
Output
IndexGrid (output)INDEX
Options
Sorting OrderChoiceORDERAvailable Choices: [0] ascending [1] descending Default: 0
